actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5345) to provide that no Federal educational funds may be obligated or expended to any State or local educational agency which discriminates against any meetings of students in public secondary schools who wish to meet voluntarily for religious purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5345 (religion in the public schools).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5345) to provide that no Federal educational funds may be obligated or expended to any State or local educational agency which discriminates against any meetings of students in public secondary schools who wish to meet voluntarily for religious purposes.
